special_text:
[+1]: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn. Up to one target creature can’t attack you or Seiko until your next turn.
[-2]: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a song counter on this emblem, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control for each song counter on this emblem.”
